subject: Managers Wanted!
body:
This email was sent by a 3rd party on behalf of HomeBusinessConnection, 
      which does not have your email address. To stop receiving our offers,
click here. 
      To unsubscribe from the list owner who sent you this email, 
      please follow the sender's instructions in the email.
      HomeBusinessConnection, 1595 S Mount Joy St, Elizabethtown, PA 17022
